Out on a Whims owner considered retiring once the shop hit its fifteenth anniversary but hes decided to stay.The anniversary of the store  E PERIOD Lincoln Highway is March  PERIOD Owner Kenny Weinstock said despite considering retiring after his fifteenth year.. PERIOD

On West Lincoln Highway a new tattoo shop has emerged DeKalb Tattoo Company which opened Tuesday.DeKalb Tattoo Company  W PERIOD Lincoln Highway will join DeKalbs other two tattoo shops Out On A Whim and Proton Tattoo PERIOD Nick Misitano owner of DeKalb.. PERIOD

Halloween is all about having the most creepy decorations out for display and DeKalb residents and business owners participated in spreading the holiday spirit PERIOD DeKalb resident Karen Lindemann said she decorates every year PERIOD I just enjoy picking stuff.. PERIOD

Chuntera Napier was  that even with her consent it was still illegal for her son Gaquan to get a tattoo of his brother Malik who died after being hit by a car according to an ABC NEWS article.Local tattoo artists disagree with this Georgia.. PERIOD

An herbal blend that gets users high and is currently legal in Illinois will be banned starting Jan PERIOD  and local merchants that sell the substance are responding to the ban PERIOD  said Abraham Mustafa.. PERIOD
